paramInformation.label: Change the state of indicator light
paramInformation.description: Default status of socket LED is on as indicator when the load is off

options.label: LED is off when load is off
LED is on when load is off

paramInformation.label: Memory Function
paramInformation.description: Default with memory: the socket status is same as before when power is on

options.label: socket status is same as before power outage
